titles.title: Mni Wiconi Project Act of 1988
A resolution disposing of Senate amendments to the bill H.R. 2772.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 394 - 24 (Record Vote No: 423).

bill.summary: 10/3/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 2772 (South Dakota water systems), with the Senate amendments thereto, and disposing of the Senate amendments.
